<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<ArrayList<Integer>> it = possibleRoutes.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
int index = it.next().indexOf(Collections.min(routesDistances));
System.out.println(index);
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the `Iterator` to iterate through the list of lists in the `HashSet` and access the `indexOf` method on the list to find the index of the minimum distance.
